name: Frau Koma kommt
description:
The Story driven Text-Adventure made at the Berlin University of Art and Design. By Christopher Boeckh , Adrian Köhlmoos and Christopher Etmer.

We,ll step into the Story of Jonathan. A School Psychologist that find himself in a wierd situation. A problem occured in the school and one of the children got seriously injured. The council gave him the Job to unreavel the situation by asking the kids, who might have seen something. Some talk about irrelevant Stuff and it is up to him, to filter and analyse the situation.
